name: TRSASHD1.4FCR
description:
Total Racing Super All Star HD 1.4 First Chapter Revenge (TRSASHD1.4FCR) is an epic combat racing game, where you can choose up to 4 weapons and circuits to defeat your enemies.

Featuring many powerups which provide more epic real-time combats and more explosions.

This game was been made by two students of Universidad Autónoma de Madrid,  Ángel Bernal García & Andrés Calderón Ayuso.
